trans-unit.source: Exercise – Create a 3rd Party Purchase Order from a Rent Order

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Create a 3rd Party Purchase Order from a Rent Order

trans-unit.source: Customer R-40000 needs to rent a 20 Feet Store Container (item R-40000-01) from March 1, 2019 through April 30, 2019 which is not currently available. The container must be rented from vendor R-40000 in order to rent it to the customer.

seg-source.mrk: Customer R-40000 needs to rent a 20 Feet Store Container (item R-40000-01) from March 1, 2019 through April 30, 2019 which is not currently available.
The container must be rented from vendor R-40000 in order to rent it to the customer.

trans-unit.source: Create the Rent Order

seg-source.mrk: Create the Rent Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the Rent Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the Rent Order:

trans-unit.source: Set the Work Date to 02/15/19.

seg-source.mrk: Set the Work Date to 02/15/19.

trans-unit.source: Insert a new rent order for customer R-40000.

seg-source.mrk: Insert a new rent order for customer R-40000.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line of the Lines FastTab, enter the following:
  1. Type = Item
  2. No. = R-40000-01
  3. Quantity = 1
  4. Rental Rate Code = Month
  5. Month Based = Yes
  6. Rental Start Date = 03/01/19
  7. Rental End Date = 04/30/19
  8. Rate Unit Price = add if a value is missing

seg-source.mrk: On the first line of the Lines FastTab, enter the following:
• Type = Item
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">No.
• Quantity = 1
• Rental Rate Code = Month
• Month Based = Yes
• Rental Start Date = 03/01/19
• Rental End Date = 04/30/19
• Rate Unit Price = add if a value is missing

trans-unit.source: Create the 3rd Party Purchase Order

seg-source.mrk: Create the 3rd Party Purchase Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the 3rd Party Purchase Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the 3rd Party Purchase Order:

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Create Purchase Order.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Functions > Create Purchase Order.

trans-unit.source: In the Vendor No. field, enter R-40000.

seg-source.mrk: In the Vendor No.
field, enter R-40000.

trans-unit.source: : Create Rental Purchase Order, Vendor input page

seg-source.mrk: : Create Rental Purchase Order, Vendor input page

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source:
Click Yes to edit the purchase order. Notice the following:
  • The line contains the G/L Account entered in the 3rd Party Rent Account field in the General Posting Setup page.
  • Location Code is set to EXTERNAL, the location entered in the External Rental Loc. Code field in the Rental Mgt. Setup page.
  • Rental Start Date is set to 3/1/2019 and the Rental End Date is set to 4/30/2019.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to edit the purchase order.
Notice the following:
• The line contains the G/L Account entered in the 3rd Party Rent Account field in the General Posting Setup page.
• Location Code is set to EXTERNAL, the location entered in the External Rental Loc.
Code field in the Rental Mgt.
Setup page.
• Rental Start Date is set to 3/1/2019 and the Rental End Date is set to 4/30/2019.

trans-unit.source: : 3rd Party Purchase Order created from the Rent Order

seg-source.mrk: : 3rd Party Purchase Order created from the Rent Order

trans-unit.source: Close the Purchase Order page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Purchase Order page.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the Location Code field in the selected line of the Rent Order is set to EXTERNAL.

seg-source.mrk: Notice that the Location Code field in the selected line of the Rent Order is set to EXTERNAL.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: With the Shipment option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Shipment option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Serial No. field, type EXT001.

seg-source.mrk: In the Serial No.
field, type EXT001.

trans-unit.source: In the Quantity (Base) field, type 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the Quantity (Base) field, type 1.

trans-unit.source: : Item Tracking Lines, with no availability

seg-source.mrk: : Item Tracking Lines, with no availability

trans-unit.source: Click OK and then click Yes to dismiss the Availability Warnings and close the Item Tracking Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK and then click Yes to dismiss the Availability Warnings and close the Item Tracking Lines page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Purchase Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Purchase Lines.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Show Document.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Show Document.

trans-unit.source: In the Rent Cost per Rent Base Unit Excl. VAT field on the line, enter the daily rental cost.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Rent Cost per Rent Base Unit Excl.
VAT field on the line, enter the daily rental cost.

trans-unit.source: Update the value in the No. of Rent Base Units field as needed.

seg-source.mrk: Update the value in the <span class="Bold">No.
of Rent Base Units field as needed.

trans-unit.source: In the Rental Start Date and Rental End Date fields, enter the rental date range from the vendor invoice.

seg-source.mrk: In the Rental Start Date and Rental End Date fields, enter the rental date range from the vendor invoice.

trans-unit.source: : 3rd Party Purchase Order with updated rental information

seg-source.mrk: : 3rd Party Purchase Order with updated rental information

trans-unit.source: Post the 3rd Party Purchase Order and Rent Order

seg-source.mrk: Post the 3rd Party Purchase Order and Rent Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to receive/invoice the 3rd Party Purchase Order and ship/invoice the Rent Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to receive/invoice the 3rd Party Purchase Order and ship/invoice the Rent Order:

trans-unit.source: In the Vendor Invoice No. field, type the number from the vendor invoice.

seg-source.mrk: In the Vendor Invoice No.
field, type the number from the vendor invoice.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source:
Select the Receive and Invoice option and then click OK.
Note that the Qty. to Return = 1 on the purchase order line.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive and Invoice option and then click OK.
Note that the <span class="Bold">Qty.
to Return = 1 on the purchase order line.

trans-unit.source: : Received and Invoiced 3rd Party Purchase Order

seg-source.mrk: : Received and Invoiced 3rd Party Purchase Order

trans-unit.source: Close the Purchase Order and Purchase Lines pages.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Purchase Order and Purchase Lines pages.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

trans-unit.source: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

seg-source.mrk: With the Ship option selected, click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/01/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 03/01/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 03/31/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 03/31/19.

trans-unit.source: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

trans-unit.source: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

seg-source.mrk: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon of the Rent Order, click Home > Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Invoice option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 04/01/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 04/01/19.

trans-unit.source: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 04/30/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Invoice to Date field, enter 04/30/19.

trans-unit.source: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK and accept all confirmation messages.

trans-unit.source: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

seg-source.mrk: Open and post the Service Invoice Rental.

trans-unit.source: Post the Rent Order Return and the 3rd Party Purchase Order Return

seg-source.mrk: Post the Rent Order Return and the 3rd Party Purchase Order Return

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to post the return to the Rent Order and the return to the 3rd Party Purchase Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to post the return to the Rent Order and the return to the 3rd Party Purchase Order:

trans-unit.source: In the Posting Date field, enter 04/30/19.

seg-source.mrk: In the Posting Date field, enter 04/30/19.

trans-unit.source: On the rental item line, enter 04/30/19 in the Rental Return Date field.

seg-source.mrk: On the rental item line, enter 04/30/19 in the Rental Return Date field.

trans-unit.source: In the Return Qty. to Receive field, enter 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Return Qty.
to Receive field, enter 1.

trans-unit.source: Select the rental item line and then click Line > Item Tracking Lines on the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Select the rental item line and then click Line > Item Tracking Lines on the Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: Confirm that the serial number is correct (EXT001) and then click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm that the serial number is correct (EXT001) and then click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Home > Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Home > Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Purchase Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Purchase Lines.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Show Document.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Show Document.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Select Rent Return Serial Nos.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Select Rent Return Serial Nos.

trans-unit.source: Confirm that the serial number is correct (EXT001) and then select the To Return check box on the line.

seg-source.mrk: Confirm that the serial number is correct (EXT001) and then select the To Return check box on the line.

trans-unit.source: : 3rd Party Purchase Order with updated rental information

seg-source.mrk: : 3rd Party Purchase Order with updated rental information

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Service Contract Line List page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Service Contract Line List page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source:
Select the Return option and then click OK.
Note that the Qty. Returned field is set to 1, to indicate the rental item return to the 3rd party vendor.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Return option and then click OK.
Note that the <span class="Bold">Qty.
Returned field is set to 1, to indicate the rental item return to the 3rd party vendor.

trans-unit.source: : Received, Invoiced and Returned 3rd Party Purchase Order

seg-source.mrk: : Received, Invoiced and Returned 3rd Party Purchase Order

trans-unit.source: In the Vendor Invoice No. field, add a variation, such as “-2” to the number from the vendor invoice (since the number was already used in a previous step).

seg-source.mrk: In the Vendor Invoice No.
field, add a variation, such as “-2” to the number from the vendor invoice (since the number was already used in a previous step).

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Invoice option and then click OK to finish the 3rd Party Purchase Order process.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Invoice option and then click OK to finish the 3rd Party Purchase Order process.

trans-unit.source: Close the open pages.

seg-source.mrk: Close the open pages.
